Title: Eliminates the requirement that a driver's license, professional license or recreational license be suspended for failing to pay child support
Summary: Eliminates the requirement that a driver's license, professional license or recreational license be suspended for failing to pay child support.
LawCode: Amd §§244-b, 244-c & 244-d, Dom Rel L; amd §510, V & T L; amd §111-b, Soc Serv L; amd §§458-a, 458-b, 458-c, 548-a, 115, 548-b & 548-c, Fam Ct Act; amd §119, ABC L; amd §§6509-b & 6509-c, Ed L; amd §90, Judy L; amd §441-c, RP L; rpld §2110 sub§ (a) ¶13, Ins L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the domestic relations law, the vehicle and traffic law, the social services law, the family court act, the alcoholic beverage control law, the education law, the judiciary law, the real property law and the insurance law, in relation to eliminating the requirement of the suspension of driver's licenses, professional licenses or recreational licenses for failing to pay child support; and to repeal certain provisions of the insurance law relating thereto
